name: @contentstack/cli-cm-bulk-publish
description: Contentstack CLI plugin for bulk publish actions
author: Contentstack

expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:configure: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:stacks:publish-configure instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:clear: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:stacks:publish-clear-logs instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:revert: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:stacks:publish-revert instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:assets: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:assets:publish instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:add-fields: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:entries:update-and-publish instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:entries: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:entries:publish instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:nonlocalized-field-chang: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:entries:publish-non-localized-fields instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:unpublish: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:stacks:unpublish or cm:entries:unpublish or cm:assets:unpublish instead
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:cross-publish: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:entries:publish or csdx cm:assets:publish instead with source-env flag
expiredCommands.cm:bulk-publish:entry-edits: command will be deprecated in two months, start using csdx cm:entries:publish-modified instead
